name: Love is (not) Rocket Science
description:
Features: Bloom, ScreenShake, Feels

Pre-apocalyptic romance between two ballistic missiles. How will the world end? And more importantly: how will your dance of startospherical love end? You decide in our dating sim between the stars, satellites and shiny metal. 

Made during the GDS 2019 Jam in Prague, made it into finals, polished later.

Brought by FluffyOcto North:

Ondrej Paska - Programming, Screen Shake
Sofia Makanova - Music, particles, Stars
Oliver Vrsansky - Graphics, Sputnik
Petr Polak - Graphics, Grasshopper Love
Ondrej Trhon - Writing, Bloom Design
